huntsville.neighborhoods: Downtown, Five Points, Jones Valley, Research Park area, South Huntsville, Meridianville
huntsville.meetingHighlights: Growing recovery community with meetings near Research Park and downtown; a mix of Big Book and step-study groups.
huntsville.transitInfo: Limited fixed-route bus service and regional highways; Huntsville International Airport (HSV) for flights.

mobile.neighborhoods: Downtown, Midtown, Spring Hill, Spring Hill Avenue Corridor, West Mobile, Dauphin Island Parkway
mobile.meetingHighlights: Traditional neighborhood meetings with a strong presence in Spring Hill and downtown; frequent speaker meetings.
mobile.transitInfo: Coordinated bus service and regional highway access; Mobile Regional Airport (MOB) nearby.

montgomery.neighborhoods: Downtown, Cloverdale, Old Cloverdale, Garden District
montgomery.meetingHighlights: Steady local meetings with outreach to surrounding counties; midday and evening groups in downtown and Cloverdale.
montgomery.transitInfo: Maxwell/Gunter transit and regional highways; Montgomery Regional Airport (MGM) serves the city.

birmingham.neighborhoods: Downtown, Five Points South, Avondale, Highland Park, Southside, Mountain Brook, Homewood, Hoover
birmingham.meetingHighlights: Large and diverse recovery community with meetings throughout the metro area; strong presence near UAB and downtown; many young people's meetings.
birmingham.transitInfo: Regional bus service via BJCTA; Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport (BHM); Interstate 20, 59, and 65 access.

tuscaloosa.neighborhoods: Downtown, Alberta City, Northridge, Forest Lake, Englewood, North River
tuscaloosa.meetingHighlights: Active college-town recovery scene near University of Alabama campus; diverse meetings from young people to old-timers; strong Big Book study tradition.
tuscaloosa.transitInfo: Tuscaloosa Transit Authority bus service; Tuscaloosa Regional Airport (TCL); Interstate 20 and 59 access.

auburn.neighborhoods: Downtown Auburn, University area, Wire Road corridor, South College Street
auburn.meetingHighlights: Vibrant college-town meetings near Auburn University; young people's meetings and step studies; strong sense of community among students and locals.
auburn.transitInfo: Auburn Transit (Tiger Transit) for campus; Auburn University Regional Airport (AUO); Interstate 85 nearby.

dothan.neighborhoods: Downtown Dothan, Ross Clark Circle, Westgate, Northside, Webb
dothan.meetingHighlights: Close-knit recovery community in the Wiregrass; meetings throughout the week at churches and community centers; strong tradition of service.
dothan.transitInfo: Wiregrass Transit Authority dial-a-ride service; Dothan Regional Airport (DHN); US Routes 84, 231, and 431.
